    • Method Detail

      • encodeUriSafe

        public static java.lang.String encodeUriSafe(java.lang.String s)
        Ridiculously optimized encoding and decoding of arbitrary strings into URL-safe path segments. ASCII chars encode in two bytes; other chars in 3 bytes.

      • decodeUriSafe

        public static java.lang.String decodeUriSafe(java.lang.String s)

      • encodeISO88591

        public static byte[] encodeISO88591(java.lang.String s)
        Convert a string to bytes using the ISO-8859-1 encoding. This implementation does not behave well on input which uses characters greater than 256 (that is, outside of ISO-8859-1).
        Parameters:
        s - string to be encoded as bytes
        Returns:
        a byte array corresponding to the characters in s; only faithful if all characters in s are less than 256.

      • decodeISO88591

        public static java.lang.String decodeISO88591(byte[] bytes)
